title: Electric PE - find greatest Delta V from U-x graph

content.question: Between which two labeled points is the magnitude of the change in electric potential the greatest?

choices.label: <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>
<math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>
<math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math> and <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>
<math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math> and <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math> and <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
